website_summaries.verdict: Nice price point for a meat stick that weighs nearly 1 oz. per stick.
pros: Large meat sticks that deliver a good amount of protein
is better than many other brands, and large packs provide an even better value
Offered in many different flavor options to give you a good variety
cons: Product sometimes has an odd odor

website_summaries.verdict: A lot of meat in these individually-wrapped sticks.
pros: This jerky has a combination of beef, pork, and chicken
Usually arrives fresh with a decent distance to the expiration date
cons: Includes added sugar in the form of corn syrup
Can sometimes be a little greasy

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste and smell
customer_reviews.text: Received the 24 count box yesterday opened 1 slim jim up it had a white film on it threw it out opened a second one didn't look as bad but tasted funny expiration date says June 2018 but I going to say there is something wrong with this batch. I have eaten a lot of slim jims in my 57 years but these by far are the worst ones i have ever seen or smelled I will be throwing the rest out very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jerry c

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Product Description- NOT 144 pieces!
customer_reviews.text: I was in search of a more economical way to buy these instead of the local W convenience mart. The description for these says "Contains 144 .97-ounce Slim Jim Dare Habanero Flavored Smoked Snack Sticks", which jives with the math of the title- "m Jim Dare Smoked Snack Sticks, Habanero, .97-Ounce, 24-Count (Pack of 6)". So I was extremely disappointed when ONE box of 24 showed up- which works out to pretty much the same price I pay retail. RIPOFF!
customer_reviews.author: Bucky Swider

customer_reviews.title: Great little snack to hold you over till dinner.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both this (Giant) and the (Monster) size, they were both good - arrived fresh - with an expiration date of 10 months out. The Monster size has 270 calories per stick with 22g fat, 9g carbs, 11g protein. They are 12 inches long. These Giant-size have 140 calories per stick with 11g fat, 4g carb, 6g protein. They are 13 inches long. The Giant size is on Amazons Sub N Save program and both are cheaper here than any other store I've looked.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Walker

customer_reviews.title: *gag* no
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting! I'm on a high protein diet so I eat beef jerky all day. I figured it would be cheaper to buy my fav kind online on bulk. Huge mistake. These are disgusting. They taste nothing like a regular slim Jim and they look different too. Texture, taste, smell, and individual packaging is off. They look diff than the kind I bought at Wegmans side by side.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: 2 boxes were spoiled
customer_reviews.text: It's an experience I wouldn't want anyone else to go through. Biting into one of these only to find it has spoiled literally leaves a NASTY taste in your mouth and the desire to never eat another one. Two boxes out of three ended up in the garbage after opening 6 more only to find them also spoiled. None of them had been visibly opened and the plastic wrap was intact but the contents were bad, without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Longtime Customer

customer_reviews.title: You've been warned. Freshness gamble.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it wasn't a roll of the dice on product freshness. You'll either get product that is expiring shortly, expired already, or expired a year ago. Consider yourself lucky if you get something more than 3 months remaining on it's expiration date. Great tasting product when fresh, but horrible to do this to your customers. Is it really worth a buck to screw people with old stock? I buy these for hurricane food, which is a useless purchase when there is white film and the product has a funny aftertaste. Buying these are a gamble, so you've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Caveat emptor
customer_reviews.text: I last ordered this product on June 30, 2020 and received it on July 2. The sell-by date on the sticks was May 30, 2020. While the product had not 'spoiled', the flavor was noticeably different than the product purchased at my local supermarket that had a far better sell-by date. I will not be purchasing this product online as a result of this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.  SchwartzTop Contributor: Philosophy

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting; Larvae
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the only issue was the box didn’t have the right quantity. After tasting one it didn’t taste right; it tasted old. I got sick. The expiration date is four months from now. I looked better at the packages and realized several of them were open, and one of them had something in it that looks to be a larvae. This is disgusting. I’m very worried about the one I consumed. I won’t buy food from Amazon again. Horrifying.
customer_reviews.author: Em12345

customer_reviews.title: BUYING EXPIRED SLIM-JIMS
customer_reviews.text: we eat hell-a slim jims at our house! we tore into these and almost puked!!! You can see my teeth marks in the petrified, dried up skin. The only thing that came out was orange grease. The meat inside had dried up and shriveled into nothing. I looked immediately at the expiration date... days from being expired. Normally, there is a year from packaging to expiring.. so these have been setting for over 11 months and someone basically said... I don't care about my customers! I am gonna take their money and who cares if they are inedible... well... I care and I hope you do not buy this product from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Not that fresh
customer_reviews.text: These are one of my favorite snacks. Immediately I noticed the color seemed to be darker than usual. Opened one and took a bite. They were oily and did not taste very fresh and were drier than usual. Checked the expiration date and they expire in a little over a week. Faster than these can be eaten. Was disappointed in not having a fresher product. Edit: I was given a replacement box (August 25, 2020) which had the same September 3 2020 expiration date. This new box tasted worse than the first. It tasted rancid! I just wanted a box that was fresh and that I didn't have just a week to eat. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: GentleGiant

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying Slim Jims since I was a kid, and am eating them again as a quick protein source. The last package I received had some weird problems. First, the plastic stick packaging was impossible to open using my fingers, so I had to use a scissors, creatively, limiting my ability to eat them on the move. Usually, the top of the package separates and strips down around the stick. Second, the product was greasy and soft, while the skin was difficult to chew. I know what they taste and feel like, and this is not it. I still would like to use the product, but I feel unsure that I'm getting what I'm paying for.
customer_reviews.author: Adam K

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Flavor Received
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try Habanero as I've never tried this flavor! I received 'Hot AF' instead. Okay, I thought, close enough, I don't want to bother with returns for a box of Slim Jims. WRONG. As soon as I swallowed my first bite, I can feel the spiciness. I thought maybe if I kept eating it, my mouth will get used to it. WRONG AGAIN. It just gets hotter and hotter each bite. You cannot even chew for too long because your mouth will be on fire!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: At least half of the sticks I got tasted terrible
customer_reviews.text: At least half of the sticks I got tasted terrible like they were old and ended up throwing them away. I will not buy slim jim's from this retailer again and I suggest you don't either.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Original flavor is fresh and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a lot of bad reviews on this and they're all for the "MILD" flavor. I didn't see any reviews for the "ORIGINAL" flavor, so I ordered it to take a chance, and they all are fresh. I opened one and it was nice and juicy, fresh, and flavorful! The expiration date was 2021, so they're not anywhere close to expiring. The box holding them came bent and broken, but that didn't matter to me as long as the food was good. Highly recommend, especially if you don't want to get weird looks at the grocery store for getting a fist full of Slim Jims at the check out counter!
customer_reviews.author: Smilobar

customer_reviews.title: Something's "off"
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how or why, but I've ordered a few different flavors of these, and they all have the same problem.... For some reason, the bottom inch or so of every stick has a terrible flavor... Like spit it out in the garbage terrible. Sure, they're 90% edible, but it's bizarre and annoying to have to toss a bit of each one. I thought it might be me, but after 3 packages, and my wife noticing the same thing, that constitutes a trend. I have no idea how this happens (off flavors migrating to the bottom during storage?), but I doubt I'll be ordering these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Yanx21

customer_reviews.title: these were good!
customer_reviews.text: I am picky about my slim jims, they have to be soft a juicy, and not hard and dry... these were good! Edit- 9/5/16 I was reading the negative reviews and I think its funny that most the reasons people have for NOT liking them, are the reasons I DO like them!!! The gross greasy yellow stuff, YUM! ha ha In my head its gross, but I keep coming back for more and the softer and greasier, the better!!! I may get clogged arteries from them.... But I cant get myself to stop eating these.. Update: still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh, rock hard. Get full refund.
customer_reviews.text: Hard like rock or thick paper. Air in the vacuum sealed package. Expiration is on Dec 2020. Not sure when is manufactured though. Definitely not edible for human. All should go to dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo wonderful
customer_reviews.text: As a child 40 years ago are used to see these in the corner sweet shop or drugstore or at the airport and I always thought how wonderful they were but never thought I could afford them. After getting this box it is everything I hoped it would be. The taste is fantastic you don’t have to peel 10 of little ones to get enough to be full and they’re great to hand out at work to people who need that extra boost during the day. I have never had anyone refuse one yet. What a fantastic product
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Dog Bribery
customer_reviews.text: I use these to bribe my dog into listening to me. If hes ignoring me, I ask him if he wants to snap into a Slim Jim and he loses it. He does my bidding and is rewarded with a little bite. If only it worked like that on my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Jayna Wise

customer_reviews.title: Not the slim jim I grew up with
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love slim jim, but this is not the taste I grew up with. It's hard to describe, but there's no substance to it. There's a snap when I bite into the beef stick, but there's no meat! The taste is not there either. In all the years I've been purchasing slim jims, this was a real turn off. I won't be buying this again. Mine had an expiration date 4 months out, so it's not spoiled, just doesn't taste the same.
customer_reviews.author: Deb M, Mililani

customer_reviews.title: The seller is a good seller but I dont recommend buyinhg food products through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The seller was very good and gave a refund, but I wish I could give zero stars for the Slim Jims.... in the store they are awesome but here on Amazon they were very disgusting and tasted very old, even though the date wasnt expired they were very musty tasting and hard, who knows how long that sat around in storage but I will never buy a food product on Amazon again no matter if my grocery store never has them I will do without then
customer_reviews.author: S. Natale

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Slim Jims
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous SLIM JIMS I just love and box I got was fantastic- no problems! Fresh, tasty, well packaged, plenty of time bf expiration. I received shipment May 29, 2020. Expiration date on box October 29, 2020. See pics. Definitely a reorder item.
customer_reviews.author: Grammom

customer_reviews.title: Expires next month
customer_reviews.text: I eat slim Jim a lot and as soon as I tasted one I knew the flavor was off, was greasy and felt rubbery. I immediately checked the package and the box expires next month. It’s not so bad that it isn’t edible, but not the quality I was expecting. I won’t re-purchase this through amazon and will only buy at grocery store from now on so that I can check the dates myself.
customer_reviews.author: JWhite

customer_reviews.title: very greasy and almost impossible to open for seniors
customer_reviews.text: Never had a grocery store slim jim so greasy. just smears. I have only opened two. even cutting the ends I could not open without splicing the side of slim jim packaging. the ones in the stores have an easy open flap. the slim jim itself is more solidly in the casings when purchased at grocery, not greasy and slimy. i waited to long to return i think
customer_reviews.author: MI Artist

customer_reviews.title: Bad Jim
customer_reviews.text: I received the item and a few weeks back and just opened them about a week ago. They were the worst slim Jim I ever had dried out and tasted rancid. Smell rotten. Thought maybe it was just the one in the box as I had never had that issue with any of their products in the past and I have been eating them my whole life. I tried to return them but Amazon said the return window had passed. I have never returned a grocery item in my life. Not that I never had a bad product, but was so bad that I really wanted them to know so nobody got sick from eating others.
customer_reviews.author: Frank McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Cant open the dammed things
customer_reviews.text: I cant stop myself from writing this because it is so frustrating. These meat sticks take at least twice as long to open up than to eat them. I wonder if the manufacturer is thinking about the consumer when it comes to whats inside the stick. They sure havent been thinking about us when they designed the packaging for these things. I have not eaten them sometimes because I just cant open them up.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Dorfman

customer_reviews.title: Was very old and disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I love slim jims I bought a pack last month from a different buyer and it was great. I was excited to get these and I ate one it was so dry and disgusting. It felt like they were left out in the sun for months. Not to mention they expire in October which is only 1 month out. Slims jims have like a two year shelf life so these are done.
customer_reviews.author: Attila

customer_reviews.title: terrible terrible terrible
customer_reviews.text: p/s....thank you amazon for the REFUND!! terrible...i would never reorder. i will give these away so i dont have to eat them. the quality of meat was the consistency of cardboard with lots of gristle mixed in. no bueno!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Something is off about them
customer_reviews.text: Something off about these. They look right, they are officially Slim Jims but the texture and snap are wrong. Like they are old but the best if used by date is 6 months from now so that can't be right. Maybe they were left in a hot truck for too long. I've eaten any a thousand Slim Jims in my life and these are just not right. Maybe a bad batch
customer_reviews.author: some guy

customer_reviews.title: Hard and stale
customer_reviews.text: I received this item with an expiration date fast approaching (3 days). Still, I opened a snack to try it and it was hard and dry. It didn't have the same freshness as ones I have purchased in the store. This is one of my favorite snacks, but these will be going in the garbage since I can't return the item. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer w

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think its giving me the runs but I can't stop eating it. Definitely a little oily. Some have hard particles like bone, but actually seem to be hard cartilage. Need to filter those out better. The longer versions seem, softer, not as chewy. Tastes different than the short ones. I'll be buying the short ones next time.
customer_reviews.author: HuyT

customer_reviews.title: Buy these if you like flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Hello, These are (In my opinion) the best Slim Jim flavor they make, and I'm so sad I can't find them anywhere. Lucky for me good old Amazon has them in bulk. If you haven't tried these then you need to. or if your feeling charitable I'd love to get a box in the mail ;) Thank for reading my review
customer_reviews.author: T. Sayer

customer_reviews.title: Expired 6 months prior!
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered in August and is expired. It expired in March. It's disgusting and dangerous to give people expired meat products. Very disappointed as this was for my children.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L.

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy, because who doesn't want a box of crunchy slim jims?
customer_reviews.text: Revolting. I received a box full of dehydrated, crunchy, spoiled, utterly nasty "slim jim." The entire box is like this. I received nothing as advertised above. Worst purchase I've ever made on here. It's also appalling how Amazon defends products like this that are not at all as described.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Fiery goodness, and hard to find in stores - Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I used to work somewhere that sold these, and I would routinely buy us out. It's hard to find in stores, but I LOVE these things. They are definitely hot and spicy, but so delicious. I tried to eat one a day with my first order to avoid the fiery consequences with the second batch. These are delicious, and I advocate any lover of spicy food should try them at least once.
customer_reviews.author: ArtemisDeFeisty

customer_reviews.title: Just like when you were 5 years ol
customer_reviews.text: Man, 4 stars. It’s a good meat stick. I unwrap these and slap my partners in the face with them because she like meat in her face, so these are perfect!! I also like meat in my mouth so these stick fit the bill When I open these I yell “oh yeah brother”
customer_reviews.author: AcesInThePocket

customer_reviews.title: Great for sport snacks
customer_reviews.text: Not the healthiest snack, but it transports well. If I can get my son to keep his energy up for sports it works for me. This got four stars because this item was opened in the shipping box and was missing a Slim Jim.
customer_reviews.author: Nea

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff... about as spicy as the Habanero ones
customer_reviews.text: These are about as spicy as the Habanero ones for me... I might be wrong... but these are great. I would buy these again. Perfect spicy level for most people... I kind of wish they were hotter... they should do some Carolina Reaper Slim Jims.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed. Product was in good shape and had a expiration date of 8 months out which is more than enough for me. Exactly as described and taste delicious!
customer_reviews.author: CasualP3rson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Been very happy with this. My boyfriend is a trucker and likes to take a box with him on the road. Haven't had a bad box yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary O

customer_reviews.title: Taste Processed
customer_reviews.text: We tried these on two different occasions; both times they tasted very processed, probably because they are. They are not, in my opinion, a healthy snack. Paying attention to ingredients these days is highly important. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Krullstone LLC

customer_reviews.title: They're slim jims!
customer_reviews.text: Got a great deal. Came perfectly. Tasted perfect for a slim jim. Only complaint is the first two peeled opened like jack links do, the other 18 were just sealed a bit at the top and had to do the tab tear I've been doing for decades but I could see the idea was there. Still great.
customer_reviews.author: JRG

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: If you have been eating Slim Jim's since you were a kid these are great buy and good quality. I like the original flavor and it's still the same. Good price for the amount you get. If you can find them cheaper let me know. Ordered twice well packaged. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: very average online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Watch The Expiration Date!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived Prime shipping intact & on time. They taste good & none are ruined. Here is how they earned two stars. They had an expiration date: May 15, 2020.
customer_reviews.author: 1geekyguy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy Food was old
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give these a good review period. These came in and when we finally opened the box and had a few we discovered they were old, hard to chew, and tasted horrible. I am discontinuing my order with them. Food can’t be trusted. Would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not normal
customer_reviews.text: The texture wasn't the same as a normal slim jim. It was like they were warm and all the fat inside had melted away. They were just gross. I even tried putting them in the fridge, still just weren't right.
customer_reviews.author: Average Guy 1975

customer_reviews.title: Probably not your best health decision, but literally don't worry about it
customer_reviews.text: This was one of more exciting purchases. I'm not sure where my love of slim jims started, but it's a real love and don't judge me for it. These nacho flavored treats are the highlight of my after work day. I will start thinking of tearing into one on my drive back. Sometimes I even whip out cheese-wiz and put it on it. It's just great to not have to go to the gas station to get one of these. I'm happy that Amazon helped me take my relationship to the next level with the economy pack of these. I know you're judging me, but you can't tear us apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this product on auto subscription. the 1st box was great! The 2nd box some of the jerky sticks were not so great, I thought I just got a bad batch. The 3rd box was terrible. I opened the 1st stick and the color was off and the taste was worse. So I opened a few more and they were all the same!! It's not nice to sell old products!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Horrible slim jims
customer_reviews.text: I order these slim jims all the time. My recent order was absolutely horrible. Some of them tasted ok but I had a few of them that I had to spit out because they were hard and tasted terrible. I checked the expiration date and it is October of this year so I don't know what the problem is. If I could have given a zero star i would have.
customer_reviews.author: David Gimbar

customer_reviews.title: I have always wanted too many Slim Jims!
customer_reviews.text: Slim Jims are the go-to road snack for me and my husband. We usuallly pick up one or two each with our beverages while we're gassing up the car. But for this holiday season, I thought it would be ridiculous to have an entire box of them. Well.. turns out my husband also has always wanted too many! So this box of Slim Jims is the BEST holiday treat ever!
customer_reviews.author: Cant Help It

customer_reviews.title: tasted like old, stocked product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 boxes of Slim Jim Giant Smoked Meat Sticks, I really liked theses, I buy them at mini marts, gas stations, all the time, thinking that these were the same, the taste was nasty, old, hard, not even the grease, oils wasn't coming out when bitten into them, they sucked, they were old, maybe even old stock or even a BAD BATCH, I wished that I could get 2 new boxes or a total refund, would I buy them again???? I wrote the company, never heard from them, RUNNNNN they don't take care of there customers.
customer_reviews.author: UNHAPPY CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: Slim Jim's with some spice!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, hot slim Jim's. I love buying slim Jim's at the grocery or a gas station. Except they never have this flavor. I was pleasantly surprised how soft and tender slim Jim's are when you buy fresh, the ones at the stores must be months perhaps years old.
customer_reviews.author: T. Werner aka Dorlar

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: The slim jims are hard and have a bad taste to them. Worse Slim Jims I've purchased off of Amazon. Threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: zak

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete Order
customer_reviews.text: The box of 24 had obviously been opened previously, as it was all taped up. And there were a couple sticks missing, so not 24 as stated. That is Amazon for you, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Butters

customer_reviews.title: It's Slim Jim.
customer_reviews.text: ONe of my favorite snacks and getting them in bulk during the lock down makes working from home a bit more bearable. Perfect snack, especially if you are on a KETO or South Beach type diet.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: U get a lot when u buy these so they’ll last u awhile depending how often u eat them but they are very good and and super long and I like how they are in a long box as well, makes it easy for storage
customer_reviews.author: Theresa chemin

customer_reviews.title: Good surprise
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t pay enough attention, I guess; because, I was surprised by the length. It was a fun surprise though so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: wkg96

customer_reviews.title: Why was there a bone in one of my slim Jim’s?
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly terrified reading the reviews that I would get some expired long bois, but it seems like the first batch I got were all good! Shipping was really fast even for free, and overall the packaging was typical run of the mill amazon. However, in one out of the 48 slim Jim’s I ordered, there was a bone. I checked to see if it was my tooth, but I’m all good so I found that to be weird. I tried to get in touch with slim Jim about this to see if it was normal, but to no avail. Hopefully my second batch will be boneless.
customer_reviews.author: Kennith Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: Take the Paper off First
customer_reviews.text: Great size. It took me a few try’s to realize you have to take the plastic cover off first before you consume. Once I figured that out I enjoyed the entire box. I have one left. Will eat it Thursday afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Ordered (2) boxes earlier this week. When arrived, ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered (2) boxes earlier this week. When arrived, one box showed signs of being opened. Sure enough, there was only 23 stick in one of the boxes. I understand it's just one stick, but it's a little disturbing.
customer_reviews.author: Myka

customer_reviews.title: Rancid, Nasty, Gross Teriyaki flavored, some were not even sealed.
customer_reviews.text: These were not edible! Theses were so bad they are going to make someone seriously sick! A little quality control would be real nice! DO NOT BUY! NO RETURNS? I know why! YUCK! I wish I had read the reviews first!! I had to go through Amazon for a refund. Thank you Amazon for making this awful purchase right by refunding my money for inedible food.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Not that spicy.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for the flavor of these. They are definitely not “Hot AF”. I’d say the heat is closer to just hot. But, they are the spiciest slim Jim I ever tried. Just not as spicy as I like.
customer_reviews.author: S. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong! Slim Jim’s are so good! I have already repurchased a few times! It’s super cool being able to buy them in bulk as opposed to individually at the grocery store or gas station!
customer_reviews.author: KihannaVB

customer_reviews.title: Expired 7 months ago
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 boxes which were delivered on 7/23 and both boxes expired in Dec 2019. Didn’t realize until my husband took a bite and gagged.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Slim Jims are still great
customer_reviews.text: Slim-Jims are excellent, very tasty of course, they deserve 5 stars. Probably not health food though, enjoy in moderation. Great to have on hikes, camping, backpacking, etc. Apparently still made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Only 22 in my box
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these many times before. This time when they arrived the count was 2 short! No need returning them, can't prove I didn't eat them...but I didnt!!
customer_reviews.author: Grace J.

customer_reviews.title: Slim Jim - Original
customer_reviews.text: FREAKING DELICIOUS! BUT SO BAD FOR YOUR HEALTH When I was younger, I always found myself going to the nearby gas station and buying a few sticks of Slim Jim. As I grew older, I forgot about these tasty treats until I saw a coworkers eating one then all the memories came back to me. I am so pleased that I found these on Amazon since they're significantly cheaper than at the grocery store. These Slim Jims come in a box so your snacks won't bend and snap. I love the original flavor and I am going to try out the habanero and jalapeno ones
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: The reason why this tastes so bad is because its going to expire soon. The flavor is ok tasting and its more a Teriyaki flavoring as it ages. Its horrible please dont buy for your safety.
customer_reviews.author: Alisiana

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible
customer_reviews.text: These are just okay, not the delicious jerky sticks I remember. Didn't know they make them with pork and chicken. Really thought I was getting original beef sticks. My mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Never order this.
customer_reviews.text: Never order again totally dried out. This is second time must set in the sun. Yuk. Awful. Never again
customer_reviews.author: viking1

customer_reviews.title: Better price than buying individually
customer_reviews.text: Being on keto I need grab n' go snacks on hand. Slim Jims can start to get pricey buying them randomly at convenience stores. Buying them here and as a subscribe and save brings down the cost per stick and ensures I always have them on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: meat protein delivered
customer_reviews.text: This is a good way to get some meat protein delivered to your home. The casing chews a little like a steak, so it is good for meat cravings.
customer_reviews.author: noon for no-one

customer_reviews.title: Feel Ripped Off :(
customer_reviews.text: I love slim Jim's. Delicious snack to get you through meals. I bought 2 boxes which were supposed to contain (24) .97 ounce sticks. Boxes did not come sealed. Sticks are sealed but each box actually contained (22) sticks. I feel ripped off a bit. Hope the person that took out the missing sticks really needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Classic Guy

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Slim Jim's are a favorite in my household. This was the best deal I found when searching for a value pack. It arrived quickly and is just as advertised. I have added this item to my monthly Subscribe and Save delivery for an added percentage off. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ALong

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Was just delivered today. I opened one stick and wasn't paying attention and took a bite it was completely dried out and it has a white film and blue mold. Box doesn't expire until September 2020. Amazon is saying its ineligible for return or refund
customer_reviews.author: Nyra Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great source of protein
customer_reviews.text: Great source of protein for me because my protein levels are always low. That is why I have it on a subscribe, it helps since I haven't been able to eat much meat.
customer_reviews.author: A B.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a social media hungry teen.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my teenager, she loved them so much she posted them on social media. Which is apparently the whole point. Tastes like normal slim jims except with a cool box.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Genitempo

customer_reviews.title: SNAP INTO A SLIM JIM!
customer_reviews.text: Can't find anything wrong. I got early April, the expiration is on Sept 2020. That's about the biggest thing I could complain about. Having a little more time on the shelf would be nice. Use for hiking and camping, Throw 2 in per day you are going to be out. Keep in mind to hold on to your trash until you can dispose properly.
customer_reviews.author: Phath Bauer

customer_reviews.title: A++++
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. So fresh. So perfect. I was so afraid because of other reviews. So glad I chose to go for it. I’m ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great value, much cheaper than buying individually from the store. Arrives as advertised, and the packaging is convenient if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Greeno

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor like Slim Jim standard beef sticks
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor like Slim Jim standard beef sticks. Yes there is heat, but just right amount for me. On a scale 1-5, five is native Thia hot. This would be a 2.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Larson

customer_reviews.title: Received a bad box
customer_reviews.text: I get this every month and normally it's great. But this time (July 2020), the sticks smell and taste old. The expiration date on the box is Sept 2020, so they should still be fresh. I'm not happy with this month's delivery at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kauphy Normand

customer_reviews.title: Not inspected before packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Multiple sticks were open and the tops of the meat looked like it had been exposed and dried out and had to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great snack!
customer_reviews.text: A great snack for my diabetic grandson! They are exactly what I expected. Bought them at a better price than at grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores E Murawski

customer_reviews.title: My first time of slim jim
customer_reviews.text: Other than a bit sour taste, it’s good. My 6 year girl can finish one at a time. The box I got has expiration date in Sept 2020 which is long enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wedison

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: So I bite into it and noticed the texture was different( hard) well there all expired since May 2020 ,disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Pain to open
customer_reviews.text: To many in the package were so difficult to open. That part that says open here is basically pressed shut and you can't rip the plastic so you either need a scissors or a knife to open.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: GOOD TASTING, USUALLY ITS EASY TO OPEN SO CAN HAVE THEM WHERE EVER YOU ARE.
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE THEM TO SNACK ON..I AM DIABETIC , SO LOVE TO SNACK ON THEM
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Koepke

customer_reviews.title: Low Carb, Salty, Spicy, Delicious Snack
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying the Jack Links beef jerky in my neighborhood warehouse store but I didn't love it. The Slim Jims are nice low-carb snacks because they're delicious and salty but only have 4 carbs and they also have a little bit of spice to them which makes you feel like you're actually eating something tasty instead of just dried meat. Now I subscribe and save for these and the whole family loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.text: The box of jerkey was just thrown in a cardboard box for shipping. The box the jerkey was in was ripped open. All of the jerkey was past the expiration date and stale. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Horrible ,Horrible Packaging ....:(
customer_reviews.text: I Cant Say Enough Good Thing's About This Beefy Spicy Snack, So Ill Just Say This, Its Every Jerky Lover's Spicy Coated Dream. But I Can Say That The Box It Came In Was Horrible Damaged And Improperly Packed In Such A Way That If It Hadn't Been For Math,Because I Counted And Indeed There Was 24 Slim Jim's As It Said,But They Were Loose Shipped And Strewn About This Over sized Box With Holes And Dents In It.The Con Agra Food Company Need's To Take Better Care In There Shipping And Handling Department, ESPECIALLY With FOOD Product's! Because Of There Negligence, I Am Now Worried About Ordering From Them Again, But Again I Can't Stress Enough .....There Damn Tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Newport

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: These were so stale when I got them. They weren’t expired either but they were so gross. Also the bottom of the box was falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great product packaging and very good price! VERY fast delivery! Definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: jennw0913

customer_reviews.title: Very Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Although the skin is too chewy, these snacks not only taste good but are somewhat healthy. They must be really good as my son ate about five of them the last time he visited.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Killough

customer_reviews.title: Love Slim Jims and what an awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow what an incredible price for these! Half the price of what they cost in stores! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie McGovern

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: They were cheaper then buying them in a store I just wish they would go back to making them all beef
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: Just didn’t taste right
customer_reviews.text: The stick is small in diameter and the flavor seemed a little off and kinda greasy. I sent them out on our boat for an “emergency snack”....my husband will eat anything!
customer_reviews.author: Yoyo’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Expired product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these once before and they were fantastic. I re-ordered these in April and received a product that was absolutely awful. Today I noticed that the expiration date was March 22 of 2020 which was over a week ago. I wish I would have noticed before I fed a couple to my dog and could still return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: Product tastes old. Box was supposed to have 24 sticks, only had 22. I was short two sticks. Packaging looked old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Did I mention Ive always had a weakness for Slim Jim's?! Love this size, perfect for a munchy in the car or when hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Milton-Voels

product_meta.title: Slim Jim Giant Smoked Meat Stick, Original Flavor, Keto Friendly, 0.97 Oz. 24-Count
product_meta.description: Flavor:Original| *:Meat StickSlim Jim is the No. 1 brand of meat sticks and is available in a variety of flavors of meat sticks, beef jerky, beef steak, and beef and cheese. Snap into a Slim Jim.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
